name: Chadowlands
description:
This game have been made for the Game Jam : Mini-Jam 127.

Jam's theme is "Cats²" and limitation"Use this Mini Jam's Color Palette" (image displayed below).

Description

You're a ginger cat living in a submerged landscape, your evil copy is hunting you. Build a clone army, avoid the water and survive.

How To Play Controls

Arrow or W A S D to move. And that's it.

Rules
  • Avoid the black cats
  • Water deals damage
  • Island regenerates life
  • Eat sushi to duplicate cats
  • More cats: more points (1 sushi = cats² points)
  • White cats helps pick items, are immunized to water
  • Don't get too close to pigeon, it stuns
  • Fish clears black cats
  • Donut gives speed boost
  • Collar gives resurrection power
  • Get the higher score!
Credits

This game was made by Suzon (Design) & Clément (Development) in 72h during a Game Jam.

All sprites are homemade, sounds and musics come from freesound.org and https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx. 

Thanks for playing! Write your highest score in the comments down below!
